setup.description: Setting up your server to use the application system.
setup.channelNotFound: Application submission channel not found. Please make sure you are using this command in a text channel.
setup.joinInstructions: Join our community! Please click the button below to fill out the application form.
setup.setupComplete: Setup complete. The application form is available in the {{channel}} channel.
setup.noPermission: You do not have permission to execute this command.

modal.title: Application form
modal.weekOnlineLabel: How much time do you spend online per week?
modal.didKnowLabel: How did you find out about us?
modal.beDoingLabel: What do you plan to do?
modal.channelNotAccessible: Application submission channel is not accessible.
modal.acceptedDescription:
For the first time, you are granted a residence permit. 
 Don't forget to accept the invitation to the city in your [personal account](https://dreamscape.su/pc/) 

 Also, familiarize yourself with the forum <#1213190922284568597>`
modal.deniedDescription: Unfortunately, your application was not accepted.
modal.weekOnlineField: How much time do you spend online per week?
modal.didKnowField: How did you find out about us?
modal.beDoingField: What do you plan to do?

setformresponsechannel.description: Set the channel for sending the application form.
setformresponsechannel.success: The channel for sending the application form has been set.

randomnumber.description: Random number from min to max
